front.title: SIMPLE made Simple: An Overview of the IETF Specifications for Instant Messaging and Presence using the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: The IETF has produced many specifications related to Presence andInstant Messaging with the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP).Collectively, these specifications are known as SIMPLE - SIP forInstant Messaging and Presence Leveraging Extensions. This documentserves as a guide to the SIMPLE suite of specifications. It breaksthem up into categories and explains what each is for and how theyrelate to each other.
